me.desht.sensibletoolbox.items

Class BaseSTBItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.items.BaseSTBItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<STBItem>, STBItem, InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener, STBFreezable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BagOfHolding, BaseSTBBlock, BlankModule, CircuitBoard, CombineHoe, EnderBag, EnderLeash, EnderTuner, EnergyCell, GoldDust, IronDust, ItemRouterModule, MachineFrame, MachineUpgrade, MoistureChecker, MultiBuilder, Multimeter, PaintBrush, RecipeBook, SimpleCircuit, TapeMeasure, WateringCan

    public abstract class BaseSTBItem
extends Object
implements STBFreezable, Comparable<STBItem>, InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener, STBItem

      • getCustomSmelt

        public static Class<? extends STBItem> getCustomSmelt(ItemStack stack)
        Given an item (whose material has previously been registered as a Bukkit FurnaceRecipe ingredient), return the STB item class which this item must be a type of.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack to check
        Returns:
        the required STB class, or null if no custom smelting restriction has been registered

        Construct and return an STB item from a supplied ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack
        Returns:

      • fromItemStack

        public static <T extends BaseSTBItem> T fromItemStack(ItemStack stack,
                                      Class<T> type)
        Construct and return an STB item from a supplied ItemStack. The item must be an instance of the supplied class (or a subclass of the supplied class).
        Type Parameters:
        T - parametrised type, a subclass of BaseSTBItem
        Parameters:
        stack - the ItemStack
        type - the required class
        Returns:
        the STB item, or null if the item stack is not an STB item of the desired class

      • onBreakBlockWithItem

        public void onBreakBlockWithItem(BlockBreakEvent event)
        Called when a block is broken while holding an STB item. If the block being broken is an STB block, this event handler will be called before the event handler for the block being broken. The handler is called with EventPriority.MONITOR, so the event outcome must not be altered by this handler.
        Parameters:
        event - the block break event

      • onSlotClick

        public boolean onSlotClick(HumanEntity player,
                  int slot,
                  ClickType click,
                  ItemStack inSlot,
                  ItemStack onCursor)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Called when a slot in an inventory GUI is clicked by a player.
        Specified by:
        onSlotClick in interface InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Parameters:
        player - the player who clicked
        slot - the raw inventory slot which was clicked
        click - the click type
        inSlot - the item currently in the clicked slot
        onCursor - the item on the player's cursor
        Returns:
        true if the click should go ahead, false if it should be cancelled

      • onShiftClickInsert

        public int onShiftClickInsert(HumanEntity player,
                     int slot,
                     ItemStack toInsert)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Called when an attempt is made to shift-click an item into an inventory GUI. The implementor is responsible for actually putting items into the appropriate slot(s) of the inventory GUI, but the stack being clicked will be automatically adjusted.
        Specified by:
        onShiftClickInsert in interface InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Parameters:
        player - the player who clicked
        slot - the slot that was shift-clicked
        toInsert - the item stack to be inserted
        Returns:
        the number of items from the stack that were actually inserted

      • onShiftClickExtract

        public boolean onShiftClickExtract(HumanEntity player,
                          int slot,
                          ItemStack toExtract)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Called when an attempt is made to shift-click an item out of an inventory GUI.
        Specified by:
        onShiftClickExtract in interface InventoryGUI.InventoryGUIListener
        Parameters:
        player - the player who clicked
        slot - the slot in the inventory GUI that was shift-clicked
        toExtract - the number of items being extracted
        Returns:
        true if items were should be extracted, false otherwise
